FWiMarketing News articleHello Stanley I thought this iMarketing News article about Compaq Net Seminars selling large numbers of customer prospects might be of interest to you rJaspCID The company helping Compaq put on the events iNvision has provided its expertise to many organizations that are now successfully producing and executing NETSeminar campaigns to sell customer prospects The results speak for themselves see why Compaq has chosen iNvision rJaspCID as the lead in this new communications medium If you think this might fit into your organizations marketing strategy Id be happy to talk with you further Many thanks for your time and consideration Brendan Brendan M Cotter VP Business Development Invision rJaspCID Office Efax Mobile If you would not like to receive future invitations go to trackinvisionremovehtml and enter your email address of nronCom
